mapper.select:
SELECT B.BOARDNO, B.TITLE, B.CONTENTS, B.USERID, CNT, B.FAVORITE, B.KIND, TO_CHAR(B.CDATETIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CDATE, COUNT(C.BOARDNO) AS COMMENTCOUNT FROM TBL_BOARD B LEFT JOIN TBL_COMMENT C ON B.BOARDNO = C.BOARDNO WHERE 1=1
AND TITLE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR B.USERID LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
AND TITLE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
AND B.USERID LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
AND B.KIND = #{kind}
GROUP BY B.BOARDNO, B.TITLE, B.CONTENTS, B.USERID, CNT, B.FAVORITE, B.KIND, TO_CHAR(B.CDATETIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
ORDER BY BOARDNO
ORDER BY TITLE
ORDER BY CNT DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_BOARD VALUES (B_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{content}, #{userId}, 0, 0, 3, SYSDATE, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT C.*, U.NICKNAME FROM TBL_COMMENT C JOIN TBL_USER U ON C.USERID = U.USERID WHERE C.BOARDNO = #{boardNo}
